name: Canvas Component Import

movements.name: Import

beats.title: Open UI File
acceptanceCriteria:
Given the openUiFile operation is triggered
When the handler executes
Then it completes successfully within < 1 second
And the output is valid and meets schema
And any required events are published

Given valid input parameters
When openUiFile processes them
Then results conform to expected schema
And no errors are thrown
And telemetry events are recorded with latency metrics

Given error conditions
When openUiFile encounters an error
Then the error is logged with full context
And appropriate recovery is attempted
And the system remains stable

Given performance SLA of < 1 second
When openUiFile executes
Then latency is consistently within target
And throughput meets baseline requirements
And resource usage stays within bounds

Given compliance and governance
When openUiFile operates
Then all governance rules are enforced
And audit trails capture execution
And no compliance violations occur
beats.userStory: As a platform operator, I need `openUiFile` to resolve local/remote paths, validate file type, and expose stream metadata in ≤1s P95 so downstream parsing can proceed without retries.

beats.title: Create Components Sequentially
beats.scenario: Generate or Create create Components Sequentially
acceptanceCriteria:
Given the createComponentsSequentially operation is triggered
When the handler executes
Then it completes successfully within < 2 seconds
And the output is valid and meets schema
And any required events are published

Given valid input parameters
When createComponentsSequentially processes them
Then results conform to expected schema
And no errors are thrown
And telemetry events are recorded with latency metrics

Given error conditions
When createComponentsSequentially encounters an error
Then the error is logged with full context
And appropriate recovery is attempted
And the system remains stable

Given performance SLA of < 2 seconds
When createComponentsSequentially executes
Then latency is consistently within target
And throughput meets baseline requirements
And resource usage stays within bounds

Given compliance and governance
When createComponentsSequentially operates
Then all governance rules are enforced
And audit trails capture execution
And no compliance violations occur
beats.userStory: As a composition service owner, I need `createComponentsSequentially` to construct nodes from templates in ≤2s P95, honoring dependencies and avoiding direct rendering, forwarding to the drop symphony.
beats.testCase: forwards to drop symphony and does not render React nodes directly

movements.userStory: As a frontend platform integrator, I need the import symphony to open, parse, and map UI assets deterministically with beat SLAs (open ≤1s, parse ≤1s, injectCss ≤1s, createSequential ≤2s, hierarchy ≤1s) and 99.9% success so imported components render predictably.
movements.businessValue: Enables reliable operations with measurable KPIs; ensures consistent service delivery with SLA compliance (target: 99.9%)
